037package org.jfree.chart.block;
038
039import java.awt.Graphics2D;
040import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
041import java.io.Serializable;
042import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
043
044/**
045 * An empty block with a fixed size.
046 */
047public class EmptyBlock extends AbstractBlock implements Block, Cloneable, 
048        PublicCloneable, Serializable {
049
050    /** For serialization. */
051    private static final long serialVersionUID = -4083197869412648579L;
052
053    /**
054     * Creates a new block with the specified width and height.
055     *
056     * @param width  the width.
057     * @param height  the height.
058     */
059    public EmptyBlock(double width, double height) {
060        setWidth(width);
061        setHeight(height);
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and
066     * returns the block size.
067     *
068     * @param g2  the graphics device.
069     * @param constraint  the constraint ({@code null} not permitted).
070     *
071     * @return The block size (in Java2D units, never {@code null}).
072     */
073    @Override
074    public Size2D arrange(Graphics2D g2, RectangleConstraint constraint) {
075        Size2D base = new Size2D(calculateTotalWidth(getWidth()),
076                calculateTotalHeight(getHeight()));
077        return constraint.calculateConstrainedSize(base);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Draws the block.  Since the block is empty, there is nothing to draw
082     * except the optional border.
083     *
084     * @param g2  the graphics device.
085     * @param area  the area.
086     */
087    @Override
088    public void draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
089        draw(g2, area, null);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Draws the block within the specified area.  Since the block is empty,
094     * there is nothing to draw except the optional border.
095     *
096     * @param g2  the graphics device.
097     * @param area  the area.
098     * @param params  ignored ({@code null} permitted).
099     *
100     * @return Always {@code null}.
101     */
102    @Override
103    public Object draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Object params) {
104        area = trimMargin(area);
105        drawBorder(g2, area);
106        return null;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Returns a clone of the block.
111     *
112     * @return A clone.
113     *
114     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException if there is a problem cloning.
115     */
116    @Override
117    public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
118        return super.clone();
119    }
120
121}
